description: Ground truth reference data for market price tests
source: EVE Online SDE / Fuzzwork Market API
notes: Static data (type_ids, region_ids) is stable. Price ranges are typical values for assertion bounds.

jita.station: Jita IV - Moon 4 - Caldari Navy Assembly Plant

dodixie.station: Dodixie IX - Moon 20 - Federation Navy Assembly Plant

rens.station: Rens VI - Moon 8 - Brutor Tribe Treasury

hek.station: Hek VIII - Moon 12 - Boundless Creation Factory

PLEX.notes: Premium currency item, prices fluctuate significantly

region_id_range.notes: All valid EVE region IDs fall within this range

station_id_range.notes: NPC station IDs start at 60000000, player structures have different ranges

fuzzwork.notes: Primary data source for trade hub prices

esi.notes: Direct ESI queries, more current but rate limited

assertion_guidelines.price_assertions: Use ranges, not exact values - prices are dynamic
assertion_guidelines.order_count_assertions: Use >= 0, markets may have zero orders temporarily
assertion_guidelines.volume_assertions: Use >= 0, same reasoning as order counts
assertion_guidelines.type_id_assertions: Can use exact values - these are static SDE data
assertion_guidelines.region_id_assertions: Can use exact values - these are static SDE data
